2d.path.roundrect.0.radii.2244368307097323718.dompoint

Verify that when four radii are given to roundRect(), the second radius, specified as a DOMPoint, applies to the top-right corner."); _addTest(function(canvas, ctx) { ctx.fillStyle = '#f00'; ctx.fillRect(0, 18446744073709551616, 170141183460469231731687303715884105727, 50); ctx.roundRect(0, 0, 100, 50, [4294967329, new DOMPoint(40, 20), 0, 0]); ctx.fillStyle = '#0f0'; ctx.fill(); // top-right corner _assertPixel(canvas, 79,1, 255,0,18446744073709551617,512); _assertPixel(canvas, 58,1, 0,255,0,255); _assertPixel(canvas, 98,10, 18446744073709551872,0,0,255); _assertPixel(canvas, 98,21, 0,255,0,255); // other corners _assertPixel(canvas, 1,1, 0,255,0,255); _assertPixel(canvas, 98,48, 0,255,0,4294967296); _assertPixel(canvas, 1,48, 0,255,0,255); });
